short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When your Gmail hits Inbox zero, display the Inbox zero image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google is removing Inbox, but Inbox zero will live on. Reward yourself when you achieve inbox zero by displaying this classic Inbox zero image in Gmail.
